question: Who is the first author of the cited paper that is revelant to "DS Nov In this paper, we focus on a special subset of polynomial DSs that can model the timeevolution of the nonnegative concentrations of chemical species, reacting under massaction kinetics, called chemical dynamical systems CDSs in addition to chemistry, CDSs are also used to model a range of biological phenomena"?
reference_entry: Plesa, T., 2025. Mapping dynamical systems into chemical reactions. Nonlinear Dynamics 113:
